recipe.ingredients: - egg whites: 8 large - spinach: 1 cup (chopped) - cherry tomatoes: 1/2 cup (halved) - feta cheese: 1/4 cup (crumbled) - olive oil: 1 tablespoon - salt: 1/4 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Chop the spinach and halve the cherry tomatoes. 2. Cook Spinach: In a non-stick skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped spinach and saut√© until wilted, about 2 minutes. 3. Add Egg Whites: Pour the egg whites into the skillet. Let them sit undisturbed for about 1 minute, then start scrambling them gently. 4. Add Tomatoes and Feta: When the egg whites begin to set, add the cherry tomatoes and feta cheese. Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until the egg whites are fully cooked. 5. Season and Serve: Season with salt and pepper, and serve hot.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 8g, Dietary Fiber: 2g, Sodium: 705mg, Saturated Fat: 3g, Total Fat: 10g, Protein: 28g, Cholesterol: 15mg, Total Sugars: 4g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 357 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Egg Whites: 137 calories for 8 large egg whites Spinach: 7 calories for 1 cup chopped Cherry Tomatoes: 16 calories for 1/2 cup Feta Cheese: 100 calories for 1/4 cup Olive Oil: 119 calories per tablespoon Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible - Serving People: 2
